Course Syllabus

Topic Duration Materials
Introduction to Data Science 40 mins Slides
Cloud Platform and Big Data 60 mins Slides
Break 15 mins  
Hands-on 55 mins Databricks Community Edition, R, Load Spark Dataframe, Python
Decision Tree 20 mins Slides
Hands-on 20 mins R, Python
     
Feedforward Neural Network (FFNN) 40 mins Slides
FFNN Hands-on 60 mins R, Python
Break 15 mins  
Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) 30 mins Slides
CNN Hands-on 20 mins R, Python
Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) 20 mins RNN Introduction, Embedding
RNN Hands-on 20 mins R, Python, Tokenize and Pad
Q&A 5 mins
